alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 03 at 11:22AM PST until further notice by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Oregon... S Yamhill River at McMinnville. Pudding River at Aurora. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM PST Monday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late tomorrow evening and will remain above flood stage through Friday. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 545 AM PST.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area
